value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|You're safe, $Nu!
I'm so glad.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I hope you can forgive me for putting
you in danger by traveling across time
like that, $Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Who is this, $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|I am Kvasir.$k$pAnd you...are Seiðr, goddess of hope.
I see... I understand now.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Kvasir... Are you the one who
saved $Nu?$k$pI owe you my gratitude... Is there
anything I can offer you as thanks?$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|No. You have nothing for me. We two
are destined to be foes, in fact.$k$p$Sbs8000|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what?$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|Do you not recognize me? Then let
me explain in plain terms.$k$pI will not always take this childish
form; I will grow... And when I've
grown, I will take another name.$k$p$Sbs1000|$EFace_Cool|I will be known as Gullveig, the
Golden Seer.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Kvasir... You're saying you're...
Gullveig as a child?$k$p

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Y-you're...Gullveig as a child?$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|I do not have the luxury of fighting
you here and now. I have a mission
I must see through to its end.$k$pDo not get in my way.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_12,0|$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|I will complete my mission.
I will become Gullveig...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Wait, Kvasir!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We have to go after her. If she
truly is Gullveig, we can't let this
opportunity slip by.$k$pThough...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|...Though what, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I've been thinking. If Gullveig exists
over infinite layers of time...$k$pShe'd have been in this time as well.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Right. Then that girl must be the
Gullveig of this time...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|If that's true, there is still one thing
I have yet to understand...$k$pIf Kvasir exists in our past, and
Gullveig exists in our future...$k$pIn our present, there must be...
Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Apologies. I haven't managed to
gather all my thoughts on this yet.
But I sense there's something...$k$p$EFace_Anger|For now, we should focus on
catching Kvasir. Then we'll be able
to get the answers we're seeking.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Pain2|...Hm?$k$p$EFace_Normal2|What's this? Someone else has
traveled through time here
to Vanaheimr?$k$pWho could it be? ...A mortal?
Hm... Adorable.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Though...they may land themselves
in trouble if Njörðr finds them... I will
just have to get to them before him!$k$p$Sbs150|
